commands.name: add-crypto
commands.description: Adds another crypto to trade in/out of - the crypto will be purchased immediately after being added

options.name: limit-amount
options.description: Initial limit amount in USDT (will be updated on every sell transaction)

commands.name: configuration
commands.description: Displays your current crypto-analyser bot configuration

commands.name: force-buy
commands.description: Buys back into the specified crypto currency when the crypto-bot is next ran

commands.name: force-sell
commands.description: Sells the specified crypto currency when the crypto-bot is next ran and then pauses the bot

commands.name: health
commands.description: Checks the health of the crypto.com exchange

commands.name: list-available-crypto
commands.description: Lists all of the available crypto-currencies on crypto.com

commands.name: remove-crypto
commands.description: Removes a crypto currency from your crypto-bot

commands.name: set-buy-threshold
commands.description: The decrease that has to be met before buying back into the crypto

commands.name: set-limit
commands.description: The amount of USDT to use when trading the given crypto

options.name: limit-amount
options.description: Amount in USDT - updated automatically after sell transactions

commands.name: set-sell-threshold
commands.description: The increase that has to be met before selling back into USDT

commands.name: set-sell-warning
commands.description: the decrease in % relative to the last purchase price
